typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		det_key as string,
		det_language_code as string,
		det_id as string,
		det_opportunity_key as string,
		det_product_key as string,
		det_sequence as integer,
		det_principal as boolean,
		det_category as string,
		det_businessline as string,
		det_product_id_name as string,
		det_product_name as string,
		det_product_brand as string,
		det_modalidad as string,
		det_delivery_bu as string,
		det_presales_bu as string,
		det_skipcalc as integer,
		det_trxcurrency as string,
		det_exchange_rate as decimal(38,18),
		det_exchange_rate_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_quantity as decimal(38,18),
		det_price_unit as decimal(38,18),
		det_price_unit_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_price_unit_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_recalc as decimal(38,18),
		det_recalc_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_base_amount as decimal(38,18),
		det_base_amount_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_base_amount_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_base_amount_div as decimal(38,18),
		det_base_amount_div_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_total_integration as decimal(38,18),
		det_total_integration_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_total_integration_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_margin as decimal(38,18),
		det_margin_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_margin_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_total_cost as decimal(38,18),
		det_total_cost_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_total_cost_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_quota_quantity as integer,
		det_quota_amount as decimal(38,18),
		det_quota_amount_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_quota_amount_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_unit_amount as decimal(38,18),
		det_unit_amount_base as decimal(38,18),
		det_unit_amount_decimal as decimal(38,18),
		det_createdon as timestamp,
		det_modifiedon as timestamp,
		det_owner_user_id as string,
		det_owner_user_key as integer,
		det_presales_user_id as string,
		det_presales_user_key as integer,
		det_delivery_user_id as string,
		det_delivery_user_key as integer,
		hea_createdon_date as timestamp,
		hea_modifiedon_date as timestamp,
		hea_estimated_close_date as timestamp,
		hea_actual_close_date as timestamp,
		hea_close_date as timestamp,
		hea_sales_stage_change_date as timestamp,
		hea_billing_start_date as timestamp,
		hea_proposal_sent_date as timestamp,
		hea_operation_start_date as timestamp,
		hea_statecode as integer,
		hea_statecode_name as string,
		hea_statuscode as integer,
		hea_statuscode_name as string,
		hea_account_name as string,
		hea_account_key as string,
		hea_sales_stage_code_name as string,
		hea_sales_stage_name as string,
		hea_phase_name as string,
		hea_nature_name as string,
		hea_country as string,
		hea_businessline as string,
		hea_complexity as integer,
		hea_bu_name as string,
		hea_bu_divisionname as string,
		hea_gross_margin as decimal(38,18),
		hea_net_margin as decimal(38,18),
		hea_purchase_order as string,
		hea_qualification_endcycle as boolean,
		hea_winner_name as string,
		hea_resolution_code as string,
		hea_regional_opp as boolean,
		hea_commited_to_FC as boolean,
		hea_close_probability as integer,
		hea_createdby_name as string,
		opr_producttypecode_name as string,
		det_createdby as string,
		det_createdonbehalfby as string,
		det_modifiedby as string,
		det_modifiedonbehalfby as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 derive(month = split(toString(det_createdon),'-')[2],
		year = toInteger(split(toString(det_createdon),'-')[1])+1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

		cmtx_esbigdeals as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'opportunity',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'model',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: 'commondataservice-sondamigraci-org187dcebc') ~> opportunity
source(output(
		StateMetadata as (EntityName as string, State as string, IsUserLocalizedLabel as boolean, LocalizedLabelLanguageCode as string, LocalizedLabel as string)[],
		StatusMetadata as (EntityName as string, State as string, Status as string, IsUserLocalizedLabel as boolean, LocalizedLabelLanguageCode as string, LocalizedLabel as string)[],
		GlobalOptionSetMetadata as (OptionSetName as string, Option as string, IsUserLocalizedLabel as boolean, LocalizedLabelLanguageCode as string, LocalizedLabel as string)[],
		OptionSetMetadata as (EntityName as string, OptionSetName as string, Option as string, IsUserLocalizedLabel as boolean, LocalizedLabelLanguageCode as string, LocalizedLabel as string)[],
		TargetMetadata as (EntityName as string, AttributeName as string, ReferencedEntity as string, ReferencedAttribute as string)[],
		AttributeMetadata as (EntityName as string, AttributeName as string, AttributeType as string, AttributeTypeCode as string, Version as string, Timestamp as string, MetadataId as string, Precision as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> oppmetadata
opportunity select(mapColumn(
		parentaccountidname,
		ownerid,
		owneridname,
		cmtx_idoportunidad,
		opportunityId = opportunityid,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		salesstagecode,
		salesstage,
		cmtx_etapadeproceso,
		cmtx_naturalezadeoportunidad,
		name,
		cmtx_descripcion_solucion,
		cmtx_pais,
		cmtx_paisname,
		cmtx_linea_negocioid,
		cmtx_linea_negocioidname,
		closeprobability,
		cmtx_claridaddelentendimiento,
		cmtx_porcentajemargenbruto,
		cmtx_porcentajemargenliquido,
		cmtx_ordendecompra,
		cmtx_terminociclocalificacion,
		cmtx_ganador,
		cmtx_ganadorname,
		cmtx_codres2,
		cmtx_codres2name,
		cmtx_negocioregional,
		cmtx_commitedtoforecast,
		createdbyname,
		createdon,
		estimatedclosedate,
		actualclosedate,
		cmtx_fechacierreoportunidad,
		cmtx_fechacambiodeetapa,
		cmtx_fechainiciofacturacion,
		cmtx_fechaenviopropuesta,
		cmtx_fechainiciooperacion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectopportunity
oppmetadata foldDown(unroll(StateMetadata),
	mapColumn(
		EntityName = StateMetadata.EntityName,
		State = StateMetadata.State,
		IsUserLocalizedLabel = StateMetadata.IsUserLocalizedLabel,
		LocalizedLabelLanguageCode = StateMetadata.LocalizedLabelLanguageCode,
		LocalizedLabel = StateMetadata.LocalizedLabel
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> mdstate
selectopportunity, Selectstate lookup(statecode == toInteger(State),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(LocalizedLabelLanguageCode, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> stateport
mdstate select(mapColumn(
		State,
		LocalizedLabelLanguageCode,
		LocalizedLabel
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectstate
stateport select(mapColumn(
		parentaccountidname,
		ownerid,
		owneridname,
		cmtx_idoportunidad,
		opportunityId,
		statecode,
		statecodename = LocalizedLabel,
		statuscode,
		salesstagecode,
		salesstage,
		cmtx_etapadeproceso,
		cmtx_naturalezadeoportunidad,
		name,
		cmtx_descripcion_solucion,
		cmtx_pais,
		cmtx_paisname,
		cmtx_linea_negocioid,
		cmtx_linea_negocioidname,
		closeprobability,
		cmtx_claridaddelentendimiento,
		cmtx_porcentajemargenbruto,
		cmtx_porcentajemargenliquido,
		cmtx_ordendecompra,
		cmtx_terminociclocalificacion,
		cmtx_ganador,
		cmtx_ganadorname,
		cmtx_codres2,
		cmtx_codres2name,
		cmtx_negocioregional,
		cmtx_commitedtoforecast,
		createdbyname,
		createdon,
		estimatedclosedate,
		actualclosedate,
		cmtx_fechacierreoportunidad,
		cmtx_fechacambiodeetapa,
		cmtx_fechainiciofacturacion,
		cmtx_fechaenviopropuesta,
		cmtx_fechainiciooperacion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectport
selectport, Selectstate lookup(statecode == toInteger(State),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'last',
	asc(LocalizedLabelLanguageCode, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> statespa
statespa select(mapColumn(
		parentaccountidname,
		ownerid,
		owneridname,
		cmtx_idoportunidad,
		opportunityId,
		statecode,
		statecodenameport = statecodename,
		statecodenamespa = LocalizedLabel,
		statuscode,
		salesstagecode,
		salesstage,
		cmtx_etapadeproceso,
		cmtx_naturalezadeoportunidad,
		name,
		cmtx_descripcion_solucion,
		cmtx_pais,
		cmtx_paisname,
		cmtx_linea_negocioid,
		cmtx_linea_negocioidname,
		closeprobability,
		cmtx_claridaddelentendimiento,
		cmtx_porcentajemargenbruto,
		cmtx_porcentajemargenliquido,
		cmtx_ordendecompra,
		cmtx_terminociclocalificacion,
		cmtx_ganador,
		cmtx_ganadorname,
		cmtx_codres2,
		cmtx_codres2name,
		cmtx_negocioregional,
		cmtx_commitedtoforecast,
		createdbyname,
		createdon,
		estimatedclosedate,
		actualclosedate,
		cmtx_fechacierreoportunidad,
		cmtx_fechacambiodeetapa,
		cmtx_fechainiciofacturacion,
		cmtx_fechaenviopropuesta,
		cmtx_fechainiciooperacion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectspa
Selectspa sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dtopportunity

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select contact_uuid,replace(replace(replace(last_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as last_name, 
replace(replace(replace(first_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as first_name,
replace(replace(replace(middle_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as middle_name,
replace(replace(replace(alias,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as alias,
replace(replace(replace(email_address,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as email_address,
inactive, contact_type, organization_uuid, company_uuid, department,admin_organization_uuid
from ca_contact

select id, 
replace(replace(replace([sym],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as [sym], 
replace(replace(replace([description],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as [description], persid
from prob_ctg

select id, name, description
from ca_contact_type

SELECT [id]
      ,[tenant]
      ,[VigenciaInicio]
      ,[VigenciaTermino]
      ,[del]
      ,replace(replace(replace([description],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as description
      ,replace(replace(replace([sym],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as sym
      ,[EmpresaContratada]
      ,[EmpresaContratante]
      ,[VigenciaIndef]
      ,[OrgResponsable]
      ,[ContratoInterno]
  FROM [zContrato]

SELECT [id]
      ,[tenant]
      ,[contrato]
      ,[VigenciaInicio]
      ,[VigenciaTermino]
      ,[del]
      ,replace(replace(replace([description],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as description
      ,replace(replace(replace([sym],char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as sym
      ,[VigenciaIndef]
  FROM [zServicio]

select DISTINCT own.own_resource_uuid,own.own_resource_id,
replace(replace(replace(own.resource_name,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as resource_name
from ca_owned_resource own
WHERE ExISTS(SELECT 1 FROM call_req sub
WHERE sub.affected_rc=own.own_resource_uuid)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
id,ref_num,parent,persid,active_flag,type,status,category,resolution_code,open_date,close_date,resolve_date,last_mod_dt,tenant,orig_user_organization,
group_id,assignee,log_agent,customer,priority,impact,urgency,replace(replace(replace(major_incident,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as major_incident,sla_violation,
predicted_sla_viol,macro_predict_viol,replace(replace(replace(problem,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as problem,time_spent_sum,zcontrato,zservicio,ztdavencido,ztdsvencido,ztda_id,
ztds_id,zreporting_met,zreportetipo,zencuesta,zempresabenef,zempresaparam,created_via,rootcause,affected_rc
from call_req
WHERE 
last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}

SELECT 

  logg.id as ticket_log_id_ref,
  tick.ref_num as ticket_number,
  tick.open_date as ticket_open_date,
  logg.time_stamp as ticket_log_time_stamp,
  logg.system_time as ticket_log_system_time,
  logg.last_mod_dt as ticket_log_last_modified,
  logg.analyst     as ticket_log_analyst,
  logg.type        as ticket_log_type,
  logg.internal    as ticket_log_internal,
  logg.time_spent  as ticket_log_time_spent

  FROM act_log logg
  INNER JOIN call_req tick ON (logg.call_req_id = tick.persid)

WHERE 
tick.last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}

SELECT 
    sur.id,
    sur.object_type,
    sur.[object_id],
    sur.last_mod_dt as last_mod_dt_survey,
    sur.last_mod_by as last_mod_by_survey,
    suq.id as question_id, 
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(suq.txt,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as question,
    suq.sequence as question_order,
    suq.[response] survey_response_value,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(nvarchar(max),suq.qcomment),char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as qcomment,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sua.txt,char(10),''),char(13),''),char(34),'') as survey_response, 
    sua.[sequence] as sequence_answer,
    sua.last_mod_dt as last_mod_dt_answer,
    sua.last_mod_by as last_mod_by_answer,
    sur.tenant, 
    suq.mult_resp_flag,
    suq.resp_required,
    suq.include_qcomment

FROM survey sur

    LEFT OUTER JOIN survey_question suq ON (sur.id=suq.owning_survey)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN survey_answer   sua ON (suq.id=sua.own_srvy_question AND sua.selected=1)

WHERE sur.last_mod_dt > @{pipeline().parameters.targetDaily}

activities.name: Check Last Export Event
activities.description: Step to validate the last time that files have been exported to data lake storage.

activities.name: Last Run Date x Today
activities.description: Just going to execute Data Loads in case the jobs aren't processed yet on the current date.
